Clifton.North Caldwell Public Schools:
The North Caldwell Public Schools is a community public school district that serves students in pre-kindergarten through sixth grade from North Caldwell, in Essex County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its two schools had an enrollment of 1,167 students and 69.4 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 16.8:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "J", the-highest of eight groupings.
